import React from "react"; //import reactstrap import { Card, CardBody, FormGroup, Input, Container, Row, Col, Button, Form, CardFooter, } from "reactstrap"; // core components import SimpleHeader from "components/Headers/SimpleHeader.js"; //react-toastify import { ToastContainer, toast } from "react-toastify"; //import css file import "./styles.css"; function Register() { const [studentData, setStudentData] = React.useState({ first_name: "", last_name: "", enrollment_no: "", collage: "", branch: "", section: "", email: "", contact_no: "", recipt_image: "", transaction_date: "", transaction_time: "", transaction_id: "", }); console.log("student", studentData); const handleChange = (name) => (event) => { // formData.set(name, event.target.value); setStudentData({ ...studentData, [name]: event.target.value }); }; const handleFileChange = (name) => (event) => { // formData.set(name, event.target.files[0]); setStudentData({ ...studentData, [name]: event.target.files[0] }); }; const handleSubmitForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { toast.success("Register Successfull"); } catch (err) { toast.error("Register Failed!"); } }; return ( <>
); } export default Register;
